headline: DeFi Technologies launches the DEFT Valour Investment Opportunity Index

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights S&P Global, Intercontinental Exchange, CME Group, Nasdaq and Cboe Global
summary: Securities and exchanges stocks like S&P Global and CME Group stand to benefit from volatility, higher trading volumes and expanding data revenues.

headline: Barclays Maintains Overweight on Cboe Global Markets, Raises Price Target to $317
summary: Barclays  analyst Benjamin Budish   maintains Cboe Global Markets (BATS:CBOE) with a Overweight and raises the price target from $295 to $317.

raw.headline: Barclays Maintains Overweight on Cboe Global Markets, Raises Price Target to $317

headline: OSB GROUP PLC - Transaction in Own Shares
summary: OSB GROUP PLC ISIN: GB00BLDRH36009 February 2026 LEI number: 213800ZBKL9BHSL2K459 OSB GROUP PLC (the “Company”) Transaction in Own Shares The Company announces that on 06 February 2026 it had purchased a total of 93,883 of its ordinary shares of £0.01 each (the "ordinary shares") on the London Stock Exchange, CBOE BXE and CBOE CXE, through the Company's broker Citigroup Global Markets Limited as detailed below. The repurchased ordinary shares will be cancelled. London Stock ExchangeCBOE BXECBOE
